item.title: [SRL] ChArM's Flawless? Power Miner
item.dc:creator: @Xeo Xeo
item.description:
@Xeo wrote:

Well, I’ve looked over the script and it looks great.

Then I set it up on my Auto-Account and nothing happens.

It just sits there with a load of lag for a few seconds, then returns to normal but still without the mouse even moving.

Any idea’s?

EDIT: I have all the latest includes and full SRL 3.3 etc, the screen is set to 32-Bit and a pickaxe is viewable on the screen.

As far as I can see, it’s fine, the only problem might be the “Nickname 0” in the Player Options? I just made it the same as the auto account name.

EDIT2: Got it working, perfect, has done all of the random events that have popped up and ran away from others.

The ONLY problem I have is that when I check the Anti-Ban? box, it doesn’t work. It just sits there and does nothing like the above.

Read full topic

@charmz wrote:

Thank You, the picture is just used to make the form look pretty, and to all the people who are finding that lag is a problem, i think it is because of all the random checks, (SRL Randoms take alot of bandwith), but i dont want to decrease the checks because you dont want to miss a random, i already removed the autoresponder…

item.title: [SRL] ChArM's Flawless? Power Miner
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

Ok, unc, I’ve seen you flaming everywhere, and don’t even start to say Charmz can’t code right, he’s made plenty of great scripts, and if you have a problem with the lag, then don’t use the script. But don’t come here and state the fact over and over, besides, Charmz said he was going to work on the lag problem, is that not enough? Would you like him to spend every waking moment at his computer trying to perfect the script for you? I mean comon, he’s doing you a favor for releasing this script for free.

And Charmz, just ignore rude comments, if you flame him back, you’re just stooping down to his level, just let it go.

Back on topic, I haven’t tried the script, but I’m planning on it. And Just out of curiousity, what is the picture used for?

-Weibs.
